channel.title: Chaospkers V4
channel.description:
Chaospkers V4. The beauty of this project is simple. It's not really meant to be adding new features, never seen before. But to fix all the things wrong with Delta. Not by cleaning it. Just by making it more efficient, fixing bugs, all the things that seem to have been failed to do.
Good - Will not use Bluurr. It's bullshit.
No gay custom items
Economic based. You won't start with a lot of anything. You gotta work to be good.
Handled. Packaged. It's not gonna be a laggy piece of shit. I've run this server on 512 mb RAM, 3mps internet connection with 100+ players and it ran smoothly.
I said there wouldn't be tons of new features. But there will be some. Updates below.
More ideas to come...
[b]Update Log[/b] October 6th - Started development
October 6th - Packaged server...
More to come...
[b]Pictures[/b] Fixed fences without messing with the cache. [IMG]http://i623.photobucket.com/albums/tt311/chaospkers/chaospkers1.jpg[/img] More to come...
[b]Credits[/b] As of October 6th...
Delta - Original base. Client I used. (Deltascape V16)
Ddsspeced (JaydenD12) - The base I downloaded
Me (Chaospkers) - If it is on this topic, credits to me for it, unless said otherwise
[b][u][size=18pt]Please comment and give ideas[/size][/u][/b]

item.title: Chaospkers V4

item.description:
@glestrts wrote:

Dude, rewrite how packets are done, and just make the server core multi-threaded.

Read full topic
